name: Harrisburg Dairies, Inc., v. Milk Control Commission et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Harrisburg Dairies, Inc. v. Milk Control Commission

judges: Before Schaefer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
parties: Harrisburg Dairies, Inc., v. Milk Control Commission et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Schaffer,
For the reasons stated in Green v. Milk Control Commission, 340 Pa. 1, 16 A. 2d 9, the decree is affirmed at appellant’s cost.
Mr. Justice Stern and Mr. Justice Patterson dissent for the reasons set forth in the dissenting opinion filed in the case of Green v. Milk Control Commission, 340 Pa. 1, 16 A. 2d 9.
opinions.author: Mr. Chief Justice Schaffer,

attorneys: Frank E. Coho, Deputy Attorney General, with him Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellants.
Willis F. Daniels, with him Harold W. Swope and Elmer E. Harter, Jr., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Harrisburg Dairies, Inc., v. Milk Control Commission et al., Appellants.
Argued October 1, 1940.
Before Schaefer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
Frank E. Coho, Deputy Attorney General, with him Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellants.
Willis F. Daniels, with him Harold W. Swope and Elmer E. Harter, Jr., for appellee.
October 28, 1940.
